topProjects.title: Listening Habits
topProjects.description: A web application for viewing Spotify data such as a user's top tracks, artists and genres. Track and artist data retrieved from Spotify Web API, with top genres then being calculated from this data.

topProjects.title: Sorting Visualizer
topProjects.description: A web application to visualize various sorting algorithms. Collection size can be adjusted as well as the speed of the sort. I built this to revise sorting algorithms further.

otherProjects.title: Personal Website
otherProjects.description: You're currently looking at this project! I built this website using React to use as a CV. When building this application I decided to learn about styled-components and Next.js.
